name: Fort Zombie
description: In Fort Zombie, players are trapped in the small town of Piety, Indiana. Organize and build a defense shelter from an impending wave of undead. Choose a building to be your Fort and forage for Food, Weapons, Supplies and People.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2/Vista/7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 6600 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9.0c SM2 compliant graphics card with 512MB of RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
